sqlMap.select: select service_id serviceId, service_code serviceCode, service_name serviceName, service_desc serviceDesc, manage_grade manageGrade, service_type serviceType, service_provider_id serviceProviderId, status_cd statusCd, cooperation_type cooperationType, AUDIT_FLOW_ID auditFlowId , SERVICE_PUBLISHER servicePublisher , create_date createDate, s_file_id sFileId from service_spec where service_id=#serviceId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#

select service_id serviceId, service_code serviceCode, service_name serviceName, service_desc serviceDesc, manage_grade manageGrade, service_type serviceType, service_provider_id serviceProviderId, status_cd statusCd, cooperation_type cooperationType, AUDIT_FLOW_ID auditFlowId , SERVICE_PUBLISHER servicePublisher , create_date createDate, s_file_id sFileId from service_spec Where status_cd!='1300'
service_id=#serviceId# tenant_id=#tenantId# cooperation_type=#cooperationType# service_provider_id=#serviceProviderId# SERVICE_PUBLISHER=#servicePublisher# service_name like concat('%',#serviceName#,'%')
ORDER BY create_date desc

select service_id serviceId, service_code serviceCode, service_name serviceName, service_desc serviceDesc, manage_grade manageGrade, service_type serviceType, service_provider_id serviceProviderId, status_cd statusCd, cooperation_type cooperationType, AUDIT_FLOW_ID auditFlowId , SERVICE_PUBLISHER servicePublisher , create_date createDate, s_file_id sFileId from service_spec Where status_cd!='1300' and cooperation_type = '1'
service_id=#serviceId# tenant_id=#tenantId# service_name like concat('%',#serviceName#,'%') service_code=#serviceCode#
UNION select service_id serviceId, service_code serviceCode, service_name serviceName, service_desc serviceDesc, manage_grade manageGrade, service_type serviceType, service_provider_id serviceProviderId, status_cd statusCd, cooperation_type cooperationType, AUDIT_FLOW_ID auditFlowId , SERVICE_PUBLISHER servicePublisher , create_date createDate, s_file_id sFileId from service_spec Where status_cd!='1300'
service_id=#serviceId# tenant_id=#tenantId# service_code=#serviceCode# service_name like concat('%',#serviceName#,'%') service_type=#serviceType# service_provider_id=#serviceProviderId#

SELECT service_id serviceId, service_code serviceCode, service_name serviceName, service_desc serviceDesc, manage_grade manageGrade, service_type serviceType, service_provider_id serviceProviderId, status_cd statusCd, cooperation_type cooperationType, audit_flow_id auditFlowId , service_publisher servicePublisher , create_date createDate, s_file_id sFileId FROM service_spec Where status_cd!='1300'
service_id !=#serviceId# tenant_id=#tenantId# service_code=#serviceCode# service_provider_id=#serviceProviderId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE service_spec SET STATUS_DATE = utc_timestamp()
service_code=#serviceCode# service_name=#serviceName# service_desc=#serviceDesc# manage_grade=#manageGrade# service_type=#serviceType# service_provider_id=#serviceProviderId# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate# EXP_DATE=#expDate# COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType# AUDIT_FLOW_ID=#auditFlowId# SERVICE_PUBLISHER = #servicePublisher# s_file_id=#sFileId#
where service_id=#serviceId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( select service_id serviceId, service_code serviceCode, service_name serviceName, service_desc serviceDesc, manage_grade manageGrade, service_type serviceType, service_provider_id serviceProviderId, status_cd statusCd, cooperation_type cooperationType, AUDIT_FLOW_ID auditFlowId , SERVICE_PUBLISHER servicePublisher from service_spec Where status_cd!='1300' and cooperation_type = '1'
service_id=#serviceId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
UNION service_spec Where status_cd!='1300'
service_id=#serviceId# service_code=#serviceCode# service_name=#serviceName# service_type=#serviceType# service_provider_id=#serviceProviderId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
) parama

select a.service_spec_attr_rel_id serviceSpecAttrId, s.service_id, s.service_name , a.default_value , c.char_spec_id , c.code , c.DESCRIPTION , c.CHAR_SPEC_NAME , c.VALUE_TYPE, c.IS_CUSTOMIZED, c.SPEC_MAINTAIN_TYPE , c.MIN_CARDINALITY, c.MAX_CARDINALITY from service_spec s,SERVICE_SPEC_ATTR_REL a ,char_spec c where a.status_cd = '1000' and s.service_id = #serviceId# and s.service_id = a.service_id and a.attr_spec_id = c.char_spec_id and s.tenant_id=#tenantId# and a.tenant_id=#tenantId# and c.tenant_id=#tenantId# ORDER BY c.CHAR_SPEC_ID DESC
sqlMap.update: update service_spec_attr_rel set status_cd = #statusCd# where service_id=#serviceId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from service_spec_attr_rel
service_id=#serviceId# service_spec_attr_rel_id=#serviceSpecAttrRelId# attr_spec_id=#attrSpecId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select:
select service_spec_attr_rel_value_id serviceSpecAttrValueId, service_spec_attr_id serviceSpecAttrId, attr_value_id attrValueId, rule_type ruleType from service_spec_attr_rel_value
service_spec_attr_id=#serviceSpecAttrId# service_spec_attr_rel_value_id=#serviceSpecAttrValueId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
